sen.e: As opposed to Goko-han (五綱判) (Shukyo-no-Goka (宗教の五箇)) which focuses on relative advantage of the sect compared to the other sects, Sandaihiho is called Shushi-no-Sanka (宗旨の三箇) and generally understood as a principle to transcend and enroll all conflicts from the viewpoint of absolute mercy.
